name: Strawberry
description: We introduce sweet summer strawberries to pure cream and other natural ingredients. Because it's brimming with real fruit, the true flavor of our strawberries comes shining through.

name: Mango
description: Our ode to the tropical flavors of South America combines sweet mango ice cream and slices of juicy mango for a simply perfect treat.

name: Mocha
description: Somewhere between the creamy coffee coffee ice cream & the buzzbuzzbuzz of espresso fudge, it hits you: you’re wide awake & in lovelovelove.

name: Blueberry
description: Wild Maine Blueberry from the land of the puffin, now when we crave you we turn to the muffin.

name: Vanilla
description: When you dig into this pint, you’ll find a rich, creamy Vanilla that’s more vanilla-tasting than any Vanilla you’ve ever tasted.
